segments.text: How long will you stay in New York ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just tor three days . I won't need these luggages.CouId I put them here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry . If you have here more than 24 hours between connecting flights , we can't check your luggage through London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe I can put them in the airport storage there .
segments.speaker: S2
